data.name: FontDescriptor
desc: describes the characteristics of a font.
For example, this can be used to select a font.

items.name: CharSet
lines: specifies the character set which is supported by the font.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.CharSet.

items.name: CharacterWidth
lines: specifies the character width.
Depending on the specified width, a font that supports this width may be selected.
The value is expressed as a percentage.

items.name: Family
lines: specifies the general style of the font.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontFamily.

items.name: Height
lines: specifies the height of the font in the measure of the destination.

items.name: Kerning
lines: For requesting, it specifies if there is a kerning table available.
For selecting, it specifies if the kerning table is to be used.

items.name: Name
lines: specifies the exact name of the font.

items.name: Orientation
lines: specifies the rotation of the font.
The unit of measure is degrees; 0 is the baseline.

items.name: Pitch
lines: specifies the pitch of the font.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontPitch.

items.name: Slant
lines: specifies the slant of the font.

items.name: Strikeout
lines: specifies the kind of strikeout.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontStrikeout.

items.name: StyleName
lines: specifies the style name of the font.

items.name: Type
lines: specifies the technology of the font representation.
One or more values out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontType can be combined by an arithmetical or-operation.

items.name: Underline
lines: specifies the kind of underlining.
Use one value out of the constant group com.sun.star.awt.FontUnderline.

items.name: Weight
lines: specifies the thickness of the line.
Depending on the specified weight, a font that supports this thickness may be selected.
The value is expressed as a percentage.

items.name: Width
lines: specifies the width of the font in the measure of the destination.

items.name: WordLineMode
lines: specifies if only words get underlined.
TRUE means that only non-space characters get underlined, FALSE means that the spacing also gets underlined.
This property is only valid if the property com.sun.star.awt.FontDescriptor.Underline is not FontUnderline.NONE.
